game.name: Blocky Traffic Racer
game.description:
It is time to try a brand new block car racing game where you can race your vehicle till infinity! Playing Blocky Traffic Racer game is a really big fun especially when you are looking forward to create an highscore. You will find plenty of car models to ride and take your fantasy for speed and racing to the next level. Be prepared to drive a cute cartoony car in this endless journey while also collecting some gold coins to unlock new models further!
Your objective in this free online car game is to drive fast and overtake traffic while avoiding the crash with other vehicles. Play wisely, collect coins and purchase a new garbage truck to enjoy unique ride in this cool html5 driving game! The faster fire trucks are waiting for you later to be unlocked. A cop car is also there to allow you have the best of gaming experience. Lots of traffic cars, online leaderboards and cute cartoon graphics will keep you busy for hours. 
Do not forget to collect the energy and power-ups that can help you fix up your vehicle and continue your riding! The money you have accumulated during the game will help to upgrade other car types and improve your gameplay. This addictive and challenging racing car game features smooth controls and seamless gameplay. Good luck to make a highscore and to be on the top of the leaderboard! You can enjoy it without a need of installing of any particular app or software. Play more games online for free, with no install required!
